menu.content:
## ğŸ” Channel Privacy Settings

Choose how others can join or view your TempVoice channel:
- **Lock ğŸ”’**: Only trusted users can join.
- **Unlock ğŸ”“**: Everyone can join.
- **Invisible âŒ**: Only trusted users can view.
- **Visible ğŸ‘ï¸**: Everyone can view.

**Channel Controls:**
Use the buttons below to manage your channel. Only the channel owner can fully manage. If you are not the owner, some buttons will be disabled.
